messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: I have lived and worked in Oxfordshire all my life. I want to campaign on a reduction on council tax and business rates to benefit the local people and traders, as more money in people's pockets will help drive the local economy forward. I also want to campaign to keep our 'green spaces' green and that building contractors are used correctly for any future developments. I want a fair deal for our older people who have paid in to the system and need the system to be there for them.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign on a reduction on council tax and business rates to benefit the local people and traders.
Putting more money in people's pockets to help drive the local economy forward.
Ensuring that our 'green spaces' are kept green and that building contractors are used correctly for any future developments.
Aiming for a fair deal for our older people who have contributed to the system.
